channel.title: Client - source problem
channel.description: i have downloaded a 508 source and it came with no client , how do i connect a 508 client to the source so the client loads and do i need a 508 ip changer?

item.title: Client - source problem
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:6, topic:301021”][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=397332.msg2949884#msg2949884 date=1252440332]

i have downloaded a 508 source and it came with no client , how do i connect a 508 client to the source so the client loads and do i need a 508 ip changer?

You CAN use an IP changer, but I doubt it would work.
What source did you download?
[/quote]
Why wouldn’t that work? That’s the point of an IP changer…

  • wrong section.[/quote]
    IP Changer + 508 Sourcess don’t ALWAYS work together…

Read full topic

[/quote]
You CAN use an IP changer, but I doubt it would work.

Why wouldn’t that work? That’s the point of an IP changer…

cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

Is that right?
